description: This Python script downloads a PDF file containing Thai recipes, initializes an agent with a Claude model, prompts the agent to summarize the PDF, and prints citations from the response.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: An agent that interacts with models and handles responses.

classes.name: File
classes.description: Represents a media file to be processed or analyzed.

classes.name: Claude
classes.description: A model class representing the Claude language model from Anthropic.

methods.name: download_file
methods.description: Downloads a file from a URL to a specified local path.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Sends a prompt to the agent and prints the response.
